snippet.title: Noahs Ark Nintendo N.E.S. Gameplay (Konami)
snippet.description:
In this video we test out the rather strange Nes release called Noahs Ark. The game thats crossed between a shoot em up, and a platformer. You play as noah, running through each stage shooting an array of different animals and creatures, while the sea rises up in order to drown you. After each mission theres a boss, and once you defeat him you get the chance to grab hold of some fruit, which seems to be noahs favorite food. 
The game itself was a bit cheesey, but wasnt oo bad. It made me feel like i had to finish each round in order to not feel defeated. Id actually like to do a full playthrough of this one at some point. 
Its not the most common game to get hold of, but if you do see a copy, its worth picking up for its novelty value.
